testcase.name: Validating login function with valid user name and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given user is on adactin webpage............................................passed When user should enter the "Sathyadhev" and "sathvika"......................passed And user should click login button..........................................passed And user should select hotels by"Sydney","Hotel Creek","Double","5 - Five","12/08/2021","<CheckOUtDate>","1 - One","1 - One".passed And useer should click search button........................................passed And user confirmation for booking details...................................passed And user enter the "Arjunan","Mahadevan","Kumbakonam","1234567899876543","VISA","May","2022","666",.passed And user click book now button..............................................passed
